text: Martello Court Martello Court is a residential building and one of the tallest buildings in Edinburgh, Scotland. It is high, with 23 floors. It is on Pennywell Gardens in Muirhouse, in the north-west of the city. It was known as the Terror Tower in the 1970s because of the crime around it. ==See also== *List of tallest buildings and structures in Edinburgh ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Edinburgh Category:Residential buildings in Scotland Category:Residential buildings completed in 1967
title: Martello Court
